clinical_study.brief_title: Effectiveness and Safety of Yiqitongluo Granule for Stroke
clinical_study.official_title: Phase IV Clinical Trial of Yiqitongluo Granule in the Treatment of Stroke With Qi-deficiency and Blood-stasis Syndrome

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the prospective study is to evaluate the effectiveness and safety of Yiqitongluo granule in the treatment of stroke with qi-deficiency and blood-stasis in more than sixy hospitals all over China.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety of Yiqitongluo for stroke measured by laboratory index
primary_outcome.time_frame: change from baseline laboratory index at 28(±7) days

secondary_outcome.measure: Effect of Yiqitongluo for stroke with mRS
Effect of Yiqitongluo for stroke with syndrome of traditional Chinese medicine
Effect of Yiqitongluo for stroke with NIHSS
Effect of Yiqitongluo for stroke with BI
Effect of Yiqitongluo for stroke with EQ-5D
secondary_outcome.description: The EQ-5D-3L essentially consists of 2 pages - the EQ-5D descriptive system and the EQ visual analogue scale (EQ VAS). The EQ-5D-3L descriptive system comprises the following 5 dimensions: mobility, self-care, usual activities, pain/discomfort and anxiety/depression. Each dimension has 3 levels: no problems, some problems, extreme problems.

arm_group.description: Yiqitongluo granule 12g each time, 3 times a daily for 4 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- mild and moderate ischemic stroke patient with 4-25 NIHSS score
- stable patients within 1 week to 3 months
- sign informed consent before study
Exclusion Criteria:
- CT shows cerebral hemorrhage disease: such as hemorrhagic stroke, epidural hematoma, intracranial hematoma, ventricular hemorrhage, and subarachnoid hemorrhage
- severe disturbance of consciousness
- dysphagia
- TIA
- hemorrhagic diathesis
- patient with malignant tumor whose expected lifetime is less than 3 months
- allergic constitution
- gestation period, lactation period, woman with the possibility or plan of pregnancy
- those who participated in other clinical trials within 3 months or taking part in other clinical trials

responsible_party.investigator_title: Associated Dean of First Hospital of Jilin University
